task.title: Choose who can chat with you when your status is set to Do Not Disturb
task.shortdesc: You can create a list of specific people who can see your status as Available, even when your status is Do Not Disturb.

context.note: Privacy lists are available only to users of HCL Sametime Connect Version 8.0 and later software.

entry.p: Click Actions and preferences Preferences. Then, click Privacy in the navigator.
Click Actions and preferences Preferences. Then, expand the Sametime section in the navigator and click Privacy.

step.cmd: Click the When I am on Do Not Disturb tab.
Begin typing the name of the person or group you want to add and then select the name from the list of matches that displays to add a name to this privacy list.
